title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: The Magnificent Ambersons
description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

title: Mrs. Miniver
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

title: To Be or Not to Be
description: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: Bambi
description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

title: The Pride of the Yankees
description: The story of the life and career of the famous baseball player, Lou Gehrig.

title: Woman of the Year
description: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Sam comes to resent Tess's hectic lifestyle.

title: Now, Voyager
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A defiant daughter of a wealthy Boston family finds romance and confidence after breaking free from her domineering mother.

title: Random Harvest
description: An amnesiac World War I veteran falls in love with a music hall star, only to suffer an accident which restores his original memories but erases his post-war life.

title: Cat People
description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: The Palm Beach Story
description: A married woman tries to finance her husband's career by divorcing him and marrying a millionaire.

title: Holiday Inn
description: At an inn which is open only on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.

title: This Gun for Hire
description: A hitman seeks revenge on the man who double-crossed him, while being pursued by the police and a beautiful nightclub singer.

title: Saboteur
description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

title: The Talk of the Town
description: An escaped prisoner and a law professor contend for the hand of a spirited schoolteacher.

title: The Glass Key
description: A crooked politician is accused of murder, and his right-hand man tries to clear him.

title: Road to Morocco
description: Two carefree castaways find themselves on a desert shore and are sold into slavery to a beautiful princess.

title: The Major and the Minor
description: A woman disguises herself as a child to save money on a train ticket and falls for a major who tries to protect her.

title: I Married a Witch
description: A witch burned at the stake centuries ago returns to haunt the descendant of the man who condemned her.

title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
description: An acerbic radio personality breaks his hip while visiting a midwestern family and takes over their home during his recuperation.

title: Kings Row
description: Dark secrets and tragedy befall the residents of a small Midwestern town at the turn of the 20th century.

title: In Which We Serve
description: The story of a British destroyer, its captain, and crew, told through flashbacks as they cling to a life raft after their ship is torpedoed.

title: Went the Day Well?
description: During WWII, a group of German paratroopers invade a quiet English village, but the villagers fight back.

title: Gentleman Jim
description: The biography of James J. Corbett, the heavyweight boxing champion who introduced style and scientific footwork to the sport.

title: Desperate Journey
description: After crashing their bomber in Nazi Germany, an Allied flight crew must fight their way across the country to escape to England.

title: Across the Pacific
description: An American spy tries to stop a Japanese plot to bomb the Panama Canal.

title: The Black Swan
description: A pirate is appointed governor of Jamaica and enlisted to help clear the Caribbean of his former cohorts.

title: My Favorite Blonde
description: A British spy tries to enlist a vaudevillian to help her deliver secret plans while being pursued by Nazis.

title: Wake Island
description: The story of the military garrison on Wake Island and the onslaught by the Japanese following the attack on Pearl Harbor.

title: Flying Tigers
description: A squadron of American volunteer pilots flies missions against the Japanese in China during World War II.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Voice of Terror
description: Sherlock Holmes is asked to investigate a series of radio broadcasts by a Nazi propagandist known as the "Voice of Terror."

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
description: Sherlock Holmes must protect the inventor of a new bomb site from Nazi agents who want to steal it.

title: The Ghost of Frankenstein
description: Ygor resurrects the Monster and brings him to the castle of Dr. Frankenstein's son for a brain transplant.

title: Jungle Book
description: A boy raised by wolves tries to adapt to human village life.

title: Son of Fury: The Story of Benjamin Blake
description: A man cheats his nephew out of his inheritance and forces him to flee to a Pacific island, where he makes a fortune diving for pearls.

title: Roxie Hart
description: A showgirl confesses to a murder she didn't commit in order to boost her career.

title: The Pied Piper
description: An Englishman on holiday in France tries to get home with a group of children as the Nazis invade.

title: Keeper of the Flame
description: A reporter investigates the death of a famous patriot and discovers a dark secret.

title: George Washington Slept Here
description: A couple buys a dilapidated farmhouse in Pennsylvania because George Washington once slept there, but they soon regret their decision.

title: The Big Street
description: A busboy falls in love with a nightclub singer who uses him until she becomes paralyzed.

title: Reap the Wild Wind
description: Salvagers battle for wrecked ships along the Florida coast in the 1840s.

title: Tales of Manhattan
description: A tailcoat is passed from person to person, affecting each of their lives in different ways.

title: Captains of the Clouds
description: Bush pilots in Canada join the Royal Canadian Air Force during World War II.

title: Eagle Squadron
description: American pilots join the RAF during the Battle of Britain.

title: Invisible Agent
description: The grandson of the Invisible Man uses his family's formula to spy on the Nazis.

title: The Mummy's Tomb
description: A mummy is brought to America to kill off the members of an expedition who desecrated his tomb.

title: Arabian Nights
description: The Caliph of Baghdad must fight his brother for the throne and the love of a beautiful dancer.

title: Tortilla Flat
description: The lives of the inhabitants of a small California fishing village.

title: There Was a Father
description: A father and son are separated by circumstances but remain devoted to each other.

title: Les Visiteurs du Soir
description: Two envoys of the Devil are sent to Earth to corrupt the human race, but one of them falls in love.
